The Powder Is Back!

Posted on Thursday, March 16, 2006

It had been way too long since we'd had a solid powder day here in Jackson. That unfortunate streak came to an end yesterday. We took laps in Rock Springs and then finished the day off with Granite Canyon. Awesome.
